title: Christmas In Exeter Street
description: A charming story which captures the true spirit of Christmas and a must for every Christmas library!Its Christmas Eve, and the house in Exeter Street is full to bursting! Theres a guest in every nook and cranny from top to bottom and even a baby sleeping in the kitchen sink! Will Father Christmas be able to find them all This gorgeously illustrated and atmospheric picture book about a house packed full of guests perfectly captures the sense of excitement and sharing that goes with this very special time of year.
author: Diana Hendry
